name: Text-To-Speech bot for Discord
description: A Discord bot that allows you to speak to your friends in a new way.

COS_API_KEY_ID.description: API Key generated from IBM Cloud

COS_ENDPOINT.description: Public endpoint for your cloud Object Storage (You can get it from https://control.cloud-object-storage.cloud.ibm.com/v2/endpoints)

COS_INSTANCE_CRN.description: Instance CRN for your cloud Object Storage
